movie.actors: Dom DeLuise, Christopher Plummer, Erica Yohn
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 6 wins & 7 nominations total
movie.plot: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.
movie.title: An American Tail
movie.writer: Judy Freudberg, Tony Geiss, David Kirschner
